title: Ranked Twisted Treeline
body: Maybe one day it will come out, Its been a few years......

replies.body: we have missed out on 2 3v3 ranked icons already, whats a few more to our gracious lords and masters Riot...

Ranked 3v3 Twisted Treeline was a game mode a few years ago but then it wasn't as popular and since OCE isn't a HUGE community then we can't have all ques unlocked. that's why it was removed same as Team Builder. But, now a Summoners Rift Normal Draft is coming apparently.

What is the point? How many Conquest games have you played in that went pear shaped faster than a banana dying in the Australian sun?

Now how many TT games have you had that were just not worth the effort? On both the winning and losing side you get those games that are just pointless to play. Maybe with the introduction of bans first to see if that makes any difference to the games quality,

But I just think that with how TT games currently pan out there is no point. It is too easy to get 3 players together to troll the enemy and win with ease making the ladder completely lopsided.
